title: Personal Growth
lede: Personal Growth bridges career strategy and inner development—recognizing that professional success requires both external skills and internal clarity. The best practitioners invest in both technical depth and self-awareness.
stat_label: impact difference between individual contributors and force multipliers

terms.name: Force Multiplier
terms.definition: Person who amplifies the effectiveness of everyone around them

terms.name: Glue Work
terms.definition: Essential but often invisible work that holds teams together

terms.name: Career Moat
terms.definition: Skills and reputation that protect your career from disruption

terms.name: Digital Wellness
terms.definition: Intentional relationship with technology and attention

patterns.name: Compound skills
patterns.definition: Build skills that multiply each other's value

patterns.name: Self-awareness
patterns.definition: Know your patterns, triggers, and blindspots
